Teemo main here, my soul has already been sold.

The dude is seriously half the reason I even worry about this game (the other half being Vel'Koz). His cutesy exterior and his cold interior pretty much sold me. The later release of Omega Squad only made it that much better for me.

I can understand he has an annoying kit, but it's not like the little guy's THAT hard to counter.

It's not about countering him, it's that a certain aspect of his kit can just be unfun to play against.  It's possible to beat Teemo in lane and stomp him late game, but stepping on one of those traps will never be fun, especially late game.
It's like playing against old Galio or Morde mid lane as a non bursty late game mage with mana problems. You're just not going to have fun.

Teemo is elo-gravity if he's on your team. I've had a feeder Teemo ADC, a bad Teemo jungler, etc. However, if Teemo is on the enemy team, there will be mushrooms everywhere and you will have to go B after stepping on a mushroom.

Our Teemo 
http://tse1.mm.bing.net/th?&id=OIP.M63d4afec0606dc921ff57af7292efe5co0&w=300&h=253&c=0&pid=1.9&rs=0&p=0&r=0

A lot of players just learning how to play only take melee top-laners... top and then have no idea how to face any ranged champion.
(True story from a guy who wasn't quite a friend but I still helped him)

"WTF is this bullsh*t?! He can attack further than I can!"
"I try getting close to fight him and he just f*cking blinds me!"
"OMFG this is the stupidest champion with no counterplay!"
^You get the idea?

I helped him along by pointing out buying a little MR made Teemo hurt a lot less, his Q (He was Darius) was not affected by the blind, and all he had to do was grab Teemo and beat the crap out of him once the blind wore off.
After that he began curbstomping the Teemo because he had the fundamentals of how to fight him.

Nowadays though you can have Graves who can do almost everything Teemo can do but better. Still ranged, still does damage, gets tanky alongside said damage, and has a dash instead of a MS buff.
All Teemo has over him is his shrooms- which are shadows of their former selves.

Teemo is pretty easy to play against and beat. But no matter how far ahead you get, you will always accidentally step on a shroom and take a large chunk of damage, you will always get hit by a Q and miss CS, and you will always lose sight of him and have to randomly throw skillshots into bushes in hopes that you'll find him. I've countered him tons of times by now, and know that he isn't that hard to beat, but damn, is he really annoying to have exist.

Teemo doesn't really deserve the hate he gets in todays game, however back in s2/3 teemo was a beast with his on-hit builds the frozen mallet slows with his un-nerfed move quick ability made him damn near untouchable on top of that his shrooms had 600 base dmg and even when using an on hit build you would still have some ap in build so shrooms were always a threat

While the changes to Teemos stealth and being able to toss shrooms now are pretty great hes not the pure terror that existed in s2/3

He is hated because:
-Blind Dart is really frustrating for some champs.
-Annoying harass
-Even if you win or are about to win a team fight you might hit this random Mushroom that kills you after or just as you are about to succeed.
-Just randomly exploring may result in your HP being crippled as you hit 2-3 shrooms and are forced to back, followed by it happening almost immediately after if unlucky going back again.
-Runs fast like Singed creating annoying situations, especially when coupled with Mushrooms.
-Looks adorable, is actually genuinely evil fur ball.
-Not as hated as it appears, just kinda League's mascot to poke fun at along with Nerf Irelia memes, etc.
In my humble opinion, Teemo was already overshadowed by Yasuo...
